Fuentes consultadas

  • Zurdo, A. (2020). Comiendo En Las Calles de Asia. Recetas E Historias de Hanoi a Singapur / Eating in the Streets of Asia. Recipes and Stories from Hanoi to Singapore. Grijalbo Ilustrados.
  • Orathay, S. (2020). Superfacil Cocina Tailandesa (1.a ed.). Marin.
  • Cheepchaiissara, O. (2012). 200 Platos Tailandeses (Illustrated ed.). Blume.
  • Chongchitnant, P. (2016). Hot Thai Kitchen: Demystifying Thai Cuisine with Authentic Recipes to Make at Home (Illustrated ed.). Appetite by Random House.
